name: Pad Thai
description: A classic Thai stir-fried noodle dish with a perfect balance of sweet, sour, and salty flavors.
instructions: Soak rice noodles in warm water until softened.
Heat oil in a wok, add garlic and tofu, stir-fry until golden.
Push tofu to one side, pour beaten eggs into the wok, scramble and mix with tofu.
Add soaked noodles, bean sprouts, and peanuts. Stir-fry until well combined.
Toss in green onions and lime wedges. Serve hot.

name: Sushi Rolls
description: Delicious Japanese sushi rolls filled with a variety of ingredients.
ingredients: 2 cups sushi rice, cooked and seasoned
Soy sauce and wasabi for serving
instructions: Place a bamboo sushi rolling mat on a flat surface, put a sheet of nori on top.
Spread a layer of sushi rice on the nori, leaving a small border at the top.
Arrange slices of fish, avocado, and cucumber along the bottom edge of the rice.
Roll the sushi tightly using the mat, seal the edge with water.
Slice the roll into bite-sized pieces. Serve with soy sauce and wasabi.

name: Chicken Curry
description: A fragrant and flavorful South Asian chicken curry with a rich blend of spices.
instructions: In a pot, heat oil and sauté onion and garlic until fragrant.
Add curry powder and cook for a minute. Add chicken and brown on all sides.
Pour in coconut milk, add potatoes and peas. Season with salt and pepper.
Simmer until chicken is cooked through and potatoes are tender.
Garnish with fresh cilantro before serving.

name: Bibimbap
description: A Korean mixed rice dish topped with a variety of seasoned vegetables, meat, and a fried egg.
ingredients: 1 cup shiitake mushrooms, sliced and sautéed
Sesame oil and gochujang sauce for drizzling
instructions: Divide the cooked rice into serving bowls.
Arrange carrots, spinach, bean sprouts, mushrooms, and beef on top of the rice.
Drizzle with sesame oil and gochujang sauce to taste.
Top each bowl with a fried egg. Mix everything together before eating.

name: Tom Yum Soup
description: A hot and sour Thai soup with a delicious combination of shrimp, mushrooms, and aromatic herbs.
instructions: In a pot, bring chicken broth to a boil. Add lemongrass and kaffir lime leaves.
Add shrimp, mushrooms, fish sauce, lime juice, and chili paste. Simmer until shrimp is cooked.
Remove lemongrass and lime leaves. Adjust seasoning if needed.
Garnish with fresh cilantro before serving.

name: Beef and Broccoli Stir-Fry
description: A quick and tasty Chinese stir-fry featuring tender slices of beef and crisp broccoli in a savory sauce.
instructions: In a bowl, mix soy sauce, oyster sauce, and hoisin sauce. Set aside.
Heat oil in a wok, stir-fry garlic and ginger until fragrant.
Add sliced beef and cook until browned. Add broccoli and sauce mixture.
Stir-fry until broccoli is tender and the sauce coats the beef and broccoli.
Serve over cooked rice.
